name: The Four Little Pigs (1kmountains)
description:
"The Four Little Pigs" is an asymmetrical multiplayer mobile game. There will be 4 players in each game, 3 of them being pigs and 1 of them being a "PigWolf". 

Objective:
Pigs: Build a rocket to escape.
Wolf: Kill all the piggies without being notice.

At daytime, all the piggies go hunt for resources and build houses. At night, piggies are required to stay inside a house to prevent cold outside. While it is also the time for the wolf to hunt down all the piggies.

How To Play:
Drag on the upper part to control the camera.
Drag on the lower part to control the character movement, click to perform any actions depending on what kind of tool you are equipped.
Inventory Panel: Click to equip, drag the icon outside to place things, swipe left or right to the next page.

********************************************************************************************

** Since it is a multiplayer game using Unity Matchmaking, WebGL is not supported.
